content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper ore mine at position(x=-28.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3)

### Copper plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position(x=61.0, y=-52.0) and inserter that puts into furnace
- Furnace at position(x=63.0, y=-52.0) and inserter that puts into furnace
- Furnace at position(x=65.0, y=-52.0) and inserter that puts into furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when inserting items into furnace that is full
- Monitor the status of the furnace and avoid inserting items when it is full to prevent wasted actions.

### Errors when attempting to smelt without ingredients
- Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients before attempting to smelt to avoid unnecessary actions.
